## SendableEthersLiquity.sendZERO() method

Send ZERO tokens to an address.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sendZERO(toAddress: string, amount: Decimalish, overrides?: EthersTransactionOverrides): Promise<SentEthersLiquityTransaction<void>>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                                     | Description             |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------------------- |
| toAddress | string                                                                   | Address of receipient.  |
| amount    | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md)                                   | Amount of ZERO to send. |
| overrides | [EthersTransactionOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionoverrides.md) |                         |

Promise&lt;[SentEthersLiquityTransaction](./lib-ethers.sentethersliquitytransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;void&gt;&gt;
